row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_FILE_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail If Missing" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_STATUS#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "DELETE_FILE"
! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 6
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_FILE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-failifmissing" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_STATUS#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_ACTION_SPECIFIC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT :PRINT &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DELETE FILE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DELETE FILE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
